description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate-Coated Banana Bites recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate-Coated Banana Bites Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Insert sticks into banana pieces. Place on baking tray, cover with plastic and freeze for 30-60 minutes.

Place macadamia and pistachio in separate shallow bowls. Place chocolate in a small heatproof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water. Stir with a metal spoon for 5 minutes or until melted and smooth.

Partially dip banana pieces into the chocolate to coat, allowing excess to drip off. Gently roll 6 of the bananas pieces in macadamia and 6 in pistachio. Return to tray. Freeze for 10 minutes. Tip 1: For an extra-sweet treat, roll chocolate-coated bananas in sprinkles or drizzle with melted white chocolate. Tip 2: Use it up: Peel and freeze over-ripe bananas then blend them with a dash of milk to a smooth consistency â€“ it tastes just like soft serve!
